tweets.text:
There is 10 times more coral reef on the planet than chalk streams. 

The River Wandle is one of only two urban chalk streams in London.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/TSHThMTasv

EA UPDATE

The @EnvAgency have issued an update this evening, ahead of the midnight deadline.

Reading between the lines, it seems that the EA are not confident that the capping work will produce the reduction in odour we have been hoping for.

This is very disappointing. (1/2) https://t.co/DIZFt1teMz

It feels like being in the middle of a nightmare horror film @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_uk and we are not in isolation. We stand with our friends #mullaghglass #biffawestmill @NotoLandfillMK and say NO MORE @StinkStopthe https://t.co/ikCE2ibGyD

My kitchen, 2 miles away and up a hill from #WalleysQuarry, in Keele has suddenly been filled with the smell of landfill! @EnvAgencyMids sort it out! This is now a human rights issue! People can't enjoy their own homes. #StopTheStink

tweets.text:
Gassed by @RedIndustries2 
Gaslighted by the @EnvAgency & @PHE_EoEngland 

We will stand as a community and fight you with everything we‚Äôve got. What you find is @RedIndustries2 that when you harm our children we have nothing to lose @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/E34PFX01VG

Remember that 80s horror film #thefog well that's the best comparison to the nightmare residents in #lisburn #belfast #silverdale are having. Only we have an invisible gas invading our homes #mullaghglass #WalleysQuarry #environnement #airpollution @daera_ni @ErinBrockovich https://t.co/JoX2CAI9ql

@StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency It‚Äôs ironic when you read the permit authorisation to increase by 60% the annual tonnage, that Silverdale Parish Council accurately predicted where we are now. None of the so called experts or larger agencies appear to have had the foresight that more shit = more stink!

Cap it. Close it. Clean & restore it.This town will accept no less now @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland 
Oh&the important matter of an independent enquiry into your regulation which has seen the issue spiral out of control @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/erp0WcOi4Y
@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA Your organisation it not fit for purpose. You should resign and the @EnvAgency should be disbanded #stopthestink https://t.co/aubgp7ShLC
@JamesMBorg @EnvAgencyMids Same here ü§¢ #stopthestink
@JamesMBorg @EnvAgencyMids Its awful isn't it

@JamesMBorg @EnvAgencyMids I woke up to the smell of it in my whole house again this morning, as did many of us üòî I live 1 mile away and it's really distressing let alone disgusting. I get nervous about waking up in the morning in case it's back again, which it usually is. Every. Single. Day.

@JamesMBorg @EnvAgencyMids Once it starts getting in mate you‚Äôve had it, this is how we started a few months ago & it‚Äôs coming in all the time now. @ClareDinnisEA stated today the levels are coming down - shameful lies @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA

@SianieRoo @LoneRanger77777 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe 6am this morning. Driving through the Westlands and all the way through to the M6 jnct 15 it was horrendous. Unbearable stench.

Horrendous from 10pm last night all through the night. I have a spare room for you @ClareDinnisEA if you'd like to experience it?? @EnvAgency @PHE_uk #stopthestink @JamesBevanEA https://t.co/S3wTmztly2
@HelenVi00175623 @annjsmall @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @NotoLandfillMK @StinkStopthe That placard is genius!ü§©

@maireadc_2010 @annjsmall @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @NotoLandfillMK @StinkStopthe None of us should have this inflicted on us how dare they ruin our lives and health like this . In the words of my son's placard they took our air and that is not right xx https://t.co/tNwhgF6KXZ
@annjsmall @HelenVi00175623 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @NotoLandfillMK @StinkStopthe Thanks for the support, taking alot of inspiration from your campaign ‚ù§

urls.title: #EndSewagePollution-SewageBill ‚Ä¢ Surfers Against Sewage
urls.description: Philip Dunne MP is the main sponsor of this Bill and will be there when the Bill is debated. How about telling your friends and family to contact their MP? Your MP has already pledged their support for the Bill but we really need them to show up for our rivers and attend the second reading debate. It looks like your MP does not make an email address available to their constituents. You can write to them at their postal address. Find the details on your MP's parliamentary page. Thank you for supporting The
